title: Log-in issue?
body: I was in the middle of a game then i got disconnected. At 1st I thought is my connection problem. Turns out its ok. Then I try to reconnect but failed. So I log-in again but this time the client said connection error to server. I retry again an again still can't even log-in? Anyone having the same issue here?

replies.body: There was a [server maintenance](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/90RHmevE-720-ranked-disabled-upgrading-na-game-server-hardware) earlier this morning which has been completed now.  If you are still experiencing issues logging in, please let me know and we can look into this further.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9ihJirNx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-07-20T15:56:13.533+0000)
>
> There was a [server maintenance](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/90RHmevE-720-ranked-disabled-upgrading-na-game-server-hardware) earlier this morning which has been completed now.  If you are still experiencing issues logging in, please let me know and we can look into this further.

Everything is working fine now. But some of us got penalized by the game for leaving the game which we arent doing on purpose and end up having a leaverbuster. Even when we tried alot of times to log in.
Just dropping by to let people know that I got in after the same thing happened, so it was probably just a bump in the server/network. Try again?

> [{quoted}](name=Ezoroth Roze,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9ihJirNx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:32:19.648+0000)
>
> Just dropping by to let people know that I got in after the same thing happened, so it was probably just a bump in the server/network. Try again?

I'm back in but the game ended. Now the game gave me a leaverbuster. =_=lllllllll

Dang. That sucks man, I lucked out and the enemy team surrendered at 3 min (they had an AFK) right before the ordeal happened to me. I wish you the best of luck, if you have leaver queue's, I'd recommend playing mini-games (slither, agar, minesweeper) or watching videos on youtube to pass the time. It's what I did when I first had to deal with the queue's due to being disconnected.
same i do not know why
Yes! I'm having the same issues as well. The launcher tries to reconnect me but it fails to do so.

> [{quoted}](name=Luna Qt,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9ihJirNx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:25:03.047+0000)
>
> Yes! I'm having the same issues as well. The launcher tries to reconnect me but it fails to do so.

I checked everything. Client and server seem to be ok but cannot log-in for some reason.

> [{quoted}](name=DemonCrow,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9ihJirNx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-20T12:26:36.774+0000)
>
> I checked everything. Client and server seem to be ok but cannot log-in for some reason.

Same here. At least we're not the only ones!
